entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as speaking through tightly gritted teeth.

entities.name: mr. potter
entities.description: Mr. Potter's temperance for being an Auror is questioned by Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as speaking sweetly and simpering.

entities.name: auror
entities.description: Auror is mentioned as a job that Mr. Potter has ambition for.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick graded Mr. Potter's Charm work.

entities.name: defense against the dark arts
entities.description: Defense Against the Dark Arts is mentioned as a subject that Mr. Potter has been taking.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin thought highly of Mr. Potter's Defense Against the Dark Arts work.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall questions whether Mr. Potter has the temperance for being an Auror.
Professor Umbridge is concerned about Mr. Potter's ambition to be an Auror.
Professor Flitwick graded Mr. Potter's Charm work.
Professor Lupin thought highly of Mr. Potter's Defense Against the Dark Arts work.
